2. Forrest Gump (1994) - This beloved film tells the story of Forrest Gump, an idiotic man who accidentally becomes involved in some of the most significant events in American history during the 20th century.

Both The Shawshank Redemption and Forrest Gump are highly acclaimed drama movies that have received widespread critical acclaim and commercial success.
